content:
I'm glad to hear that Mike's birthday party was a blast! It's great that it inspired you to create a playlist for your own night out.

To add more songs to your playlist, I'd be happy to suggest some tracks that are similar to the ones I recommended earlier. Here are a few more ideas:

**Similar to Party Anthems:**

* "Happy" by Pharrell Williams
* "Cake by the Ocean" by DNCE
* "Shut Up and Dance" by Walk the Moon
* "We Found Love" by Rihanna ft. Calvin Harris
* "SexyBack" by Justin Timberlake

**Similar to Retro Revival:**

* "I Want It That Way" by the Backstreet Boys
* "No Diggity" by Blackstreet
* "Bye Bye Bye" by NSYNC
* "Lady Marmalade" by Christina Aguilera, Lil' Kim, Mya, and Pink
* "Jump" by Kris Kross

**Similar to Hip-Hop and R&B:**

* "Finesse" (Remix) by Bruno Mars and Cardi B
* "Bodak Yellow" by Cardi B
* "Mi Gente" by J Balvin and Willy William
* "Eastside" by Benny Blanco, Halsey, and Khalid
* "Love Lies" by Khalid and Normani

**Similar to Electronic and Dance:**

* "Tsunami" by Dash Berlin
* "One" by Veracocha
* "Pumped Up Kicks" by Foster the People
* "All About That Bass" by Meghan Trainor
* "Can't Feel My Face" by The Weeknd

Feel free to pick and choose the songs that fit your playlist's vibe. You can also use music streaming services' recommendations based on your playlist or search for playlists with similar themes to discover new tracks.

Remember to have fun and make your playlist a reflection of your friends' and your own musical tastes!
